title: Drawing, "Romulus and Remus, Thirteen Paintings for the Sala delle Origini di Roma, Faenza", 1803
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: concepimento di remo e romolo; nascita di romolo e remo; amulio consacra rea silvia sacerdotessa di vesta; remo e aquasato a re Amulio; fastulo presenta alla moglie romolo e remo; romolo e remo alatati dalla lupa; romolo da le lefi a roma;
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Romulus and Remus, Thirteen Paintings for the Sala delle Origini di Roma, Faenza", 1803.
1803. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3484.
